resources.string:
This app is an android application that developed by OUSSAMA CHATRI. 
 
 This app is just small app that gives the user some questions on geography and historizes. 
 
 The user will get a money after every question if he chose the right answer, but if the answer is false the game will end! 
 
 This app is the bita version of Quiz app!
You can begin the game,try to get a high score!
